mutants.original_line: s = ''.join([char for char in s if char not in string.whitespace and char not in string.punctuation and not char.isdigit()])
mutants.mutated_line: s = 'MUTATED'.join([char for char in s if char not in string.whitespace and char not in string.punctuation and (not char.isdigit())])
